overview:
## Discussion

Data detectors add interactivity to web content by creating links for specially formatted text. For example, the `WKDataDetectorTypeLink` type causes the `apple.com` portion of the text “Visit apple.com” to become a link to the Apple website.

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKDataDetectorTypes/WKDataDetectorTypeNone]. For other possible values, see [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKDataDetectorTypes].

# dataDetectorTypes

**Instance Property**

The types of data detectors to apply to the web view’s content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var dataDetectorTypes: WKDataDetectorTypes { get set }
```

## Discussion

Data detectors add interactivity to web content by creating links for specially formatted text. For example, the `WKDataDetectorTypeLink` type causes the `apple.com` portion of the text “Visit apple.com” to become a link to the Apple website.

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKDataDetectorTypes/WKDataDetectorTypeNone]. For other possible values, see [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKDataDetectorTypes].

## Identifying data types

- **WKDataDetectorTypes**: The data detector types.
title: dataDetectorTypes
